Name: Flame Steakhouse

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: We were in search of a breakfast place that sold hash browns! We weren't disappointed, this restaurant were friendly and happy to help. I asked for extra hash browns instead of meat options and they were very accommodating. Service was …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Friendly staff. But a soup (def not homemade) and one beer 15euro’s is much to expensive.do not rec..

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Really good coffee and can highly recommend the Dutch breakfast. It'll keep you going until at least 14:00. Service was good as well, very clean place. Offers outside seating too.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text:
They don't have tap water but a 200 ml bottled water for 3.5 € lol .. would not recommend
Food is a bit below average

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Excellent English breakfast, staff so helpful and polite.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Less expensive than most of what is around and the food is Delicious!

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text:
Very nice! A cool place, excellent location, friendly, cheerful and dancing staff, a lot of delicious food, fresh beer.
Lifted the mood and deliciously fed.) A lot of thanks!

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Wonderfully food. Our waiter was so good and funny

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Nice restaurant service was very slow.  The food however was on point and delicious. I recommend the chicken schnitzel.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Came here on my birthday for lunch. First time in Amsterdam so wasn't sure what to expect food-wise, but I definitely regret spending my time and money here. Small menu, so you'd think they'd do a brilliant job on the items- my burger was …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: I got the steak, a hot chocolate, and my husband got the English breakfast. It was all really yummy! Service was great, they even let us bring our small dog in, I really appreciate that because it was way too cold to sit in the outdoor seating.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: The waiter forgot our order. We waited for half an hour but no food was served. So we decided to leave,and when we left, we were asked to pay for the water...it’s really impolite and ridiculous. They didn’t sincerely apologize to us. For …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: It can be a bit hit or miss here but when the foods good it’s good! Service was pretty quick as well however, if you’re not used to the influx of walkers buy it might not be relaxing. It is a good spot to people watch and grab a small meal and a beer though.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Nice service, good place for having a beer and a snack

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Stopped in for breakfast. Dutch breakfast: 3 slices of bland white highly processed bread no butter un-toasted , processed ham, plastic processed cheese, over cooked fried eggs. Asked for water, a very small bottle arrived €3. Disgusting …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Great service, and the best chicken schnitzel I've ever had.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: The staff is very friendly and seated us right away.   I ordered the chicken schnitzel which was quite tasty, though it could have used more sauce and sides because it did become a little borked monotonous by the end of the meal.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Well priced, large portions and great selections. Fast friendly staff in a trendy but inviting environment! Would recommend and visit again.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Good food, atmosphere.  Close to Amsterdam Centraal. Would have given 5 stars if the server have fixed the charge on my card.  I asked her to charge me in EUROS and I got charged in USD.  Would have paid less using my credit card EU to USD conversion.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: The food was bland and tasteless, I had fish and chips, which was supposedly on the ‘specials’ list...was nothing special about it. I was given a warm orange juice. The waiter was extremely unhelpful, I assumed if I asked for another orange …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Definitely a tourist trap, only one street over from the main tourist strip - meals were astronomically overpriced but it’s to be expected with the location. 50 euros for two chicken club sandwiches and two cokes, probably one of the most expensive meals I consumed on my trip. However, the food was a decent quality and large portions.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Delicious!  We went back twice.  The ribs, both sweet and spicy are amazing.  Bitterballen was yummy and the fresh mint tea was a revelation. (Why don't I do this at home)    When we are back we will see you again.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: I Ordered a chicken club sandwich, which naturally I expected to have bacon on, there was no bacon just chicken and boiled egg. I didn't enjoy the meal resulting in me not actually consuming the meal. I expressed to the staff I did not …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text:
The price-value for the food was adequate, and the stuff was very very hospitable and professional. The waiting time was very short, 15 minutes.
Had a nice experience therefore I highly recommend this place!

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: I’d give it 1 star, but the first meal wasn’t bad. Service was terrible. Day 2 they promised me 2 different options, and at the end wouldn’t budge. I’ll take my business elsewhere. It’s a good model on how to not treat customers. There are so many better places.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: We stopped in here for lunch, and chose a chicken schnitzel.  The decor is pretty basic, but the meals were good, the service was friendly and efficient. It wasn't super cheap, but not excessively expensive either. …

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: I love places that care enough about their business to put someone outside to ask potential patrons to visit. Although the menu is limited, what they do offer, they make well. Service is very friendly. A very enjoyable late breakfast experience.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Had hamburgers for lunch, looked nice with melten cheeze and fresh vegies. But it was microwaved apparently as the inner paddy was cold and absolutely dry. Could not finish 32 euro for two.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Good location and nice steak.

Name: Flame Steakhouse

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: The worst dining experience I have ever had. Food was poor. Service was even worse. Waited an hour for two breakfasts and were ignored and not apologetic when we finally got our food  Please Avoid.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Really really good steak. Limited menu, but full of pictures so everyone can understand it. The chips and salad were good too.

Name: Flame Steakhouse

Name: Flame Steakhouse

Name: Flame Steakhouse

Name: Flame Steakhouse

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Straight to the point small eatery with wine, beer and good steaks,  nice staff and straight forward.

Name: Flame Steakhouse

Review Text: Visit each time we go to amsterdam. Fresh food, well presented, friendly staff and the best coffee.

Name: Flame Steakhouse
Review Text: Got the chicken club sandwhich and it came out raw.  Staff were helpful and removed the item from the bill but how it came out of the kitchen that raw I don't understand.
